BACKPACK_MANAGER.NO_ACTOR_FROM_UUID: A uuid was found in {item}, but the corresponding actor was not.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.NOT_OWNER: You do not have sufficient ownership over the container actor.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.BACKPACK_IS_SELF: You cannot use yourself as a backpack.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.TITLE: {actor}'s {bag}
BACKPACK_MANAGER.STOW_HEADER: The container and how much it can contain.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.LESS: Reduce the quantity to stow or retrieve. Modify the amount by holding Shift or Ctrl.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.MORE: Increase the quantity to stow or retrieve. Modify the amount by holding Shift or Ctrl.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.VALUE: The current value you are stowing or retrieving.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.STOW: Stow this item in the container.
BACKPACK_MANAGER.RETRIEVE: Retrieve this item from the container.
